text: (ai rasool) tum munaaphikon se kah do ki tum to hamaare vaaste (phateh ya shahaadat) do bhalaiyon mein se ek ke khvaah makhvaah muntazir hee ho aur ham tumhaare vaaste usake muntazir hain ki khuda tum par (khaas) apane hee se koee azaab naazil kare ya hamaare haathon se phir (achchha) tum bhee intezaar karo ham bhee tumhaare saath (saath) intezaar karate hain
